name: RGV Web Pro IDX
author: RGV Web Pro

sections.description: RGVWEBPRO IDX is a simple plugin for Real Estate Websites that offer their visitors iFrame content from USAMLS.NET by Systems Engineering, Inc.. Simply input a respective shortcode in the WYSIWYG editor and update the search values via the Custom Fields area. The “names” and “values” must correspond with the input names and values on the USAMLS.NET search page. Example: To search by MLS number, place “item1” in the name and the MLS number in the value.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin file directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place respective shortcodes in posts and update Custom Fields with respective values
sections.faq:
Is there a list of USAMLS input names and possible values?

No. It will be added in future updates.

Is there an easier way to update the custom fields?

This plugin has been successfully tested with Advanced Custom Fields WordPress Plugin and has proven to help speed the deployment process.

  • Updated for compatibility.

  • Minor bug fixes.

0.1
